author: Herald Staff
title: Herald heroes
text:
OFFENSE — Sam Pascale, RB, Salve Regina. Junior posted third consecutive 200-yard rushing game with 204 yards and two touchdowns on 30 carries in 31-13 win against Curry.
DEFENSE — Mark Behne, DB, Coast Guard. Senior recorded 14 tackles and two fourth-quarter interceptions, including one in the end zone with 40 seconds left, to key 21-14 win at Maine Maritime.
SPECIAL TEAMS — Logan Laurent, K, UMass. Sophomore booted career-long 48-yard field goal to end first half of 24-14 Minutemen win against Florida International.
